episodes.title: I was friends with a Cult Leader - and he was really nice! Keith Raniere
episodes.description:
Back in 1990, I was friends with Keith Raniere who would become the most notorious cult leader of modern times - forming the cult NXIVM. I found this out years after I knew him. Some of the things we shared together also probably influenced his cult.  Who knew?

NOTE: I don't endorse cults or cult leaders (duh!). Don't start a cult, don't be in a cult. Don't do anything you don't want to do. This is just my story with Keith Ranaire.

Here are a bunch of links about this case you might find useful. 
Ted Talk by a woman who was in NXIVM
https://youtu.be/fa7uN2vo6rc?si=UJnHOw7cCtNKT5u3

New York Times: Keith getting 120 years:
https://www.nytimes.com/2020/10/27/nyregion/nxivm-cult-keith-raniere-sentenced.html

People Magazine: https://people.com/crime/nxivm-leader-keith-raniere-speaks-out-for-first-time-since-arrest/

Keith talking about the branding process: 
https://www.news10.com/news/listen-allison-mack-and-keith-raniere-discuss-nxivm-branding-process/
